text: Yes, Your Grace is a role-playing strategy video game. It was published by No More Robots and was developed by Brave at Night. It was released on March 6, 2020 for Microsoft Windows and macOS, June 26, 2020 for Nintendo Switch and Xbox One, and on November 10, 2020 for the Xbox Series X/S. The player takes control of King Eryk of Davern and his Kingdom. They have to manage the decisions in the game which are given by townspeople on a weekly basis and help with managing resources and military to help the kingdom be better. ==Reception== The game recieved positive reviews by game critics. Critics said that they liked the characters, slow pace, writing, and animation. However, critics also did not like the atmosphere changes, difficulty, and some choices that felt pointless. ==References== Category:2020 video games Category:Fantasy video games Category:MacOS games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Role- playing video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Strategy video games Category:Video games based on Slavic mythology Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Yes, Your Grace
